sentences.en: A few large hotels maintain their own workshops for such tasks as carpentry and upholstering.
sentences.cn: 个别大旅馆有专门的木工车间和装璜车间.

sentences.en: A train requires 1 hour of finishing labor and 1 hour of carpentry labor.
sentences.cn: 一辆火车需要 1 小时的修整工劳动和 1 小时的木工劳动。

sentences.en: After John found farming unprofitable, he moved to town and turned his hand to carpentry.
sentences.cn: 约翰发现务农无利可图后, 他就搬到城里开始做木匠.

sentences.en: Ask Neil to do it — he's a dab hand at carpentry.
sentences.cn: 让尼尔来做吧,他做木工活很在行.

sentences.en: Carpentry Edge Strip : to be used for furniture edge sealing.
sentences.cn: 木工封边胶——家具的封边粘合.

sentences.en: Carpentry is not my real occupation . It's only a said line.
sentences.cn: 木工只是我的副业,而非本行.

sentences.en: Dad has quite a bit of confidence in carpentry.
sentences.cn: 在做木活方面老爸还是蛮有自信的.

sentences.en: I do not reckon I am any good at carpentry.
sentences.cn: 我看我对木工一点儿都不在行.

sentences.en: I don't think he's really learning carpentry; he's only playing at it.
sentences.cn: 我看他并不真正在学木工, 他只是在玩玩罢了.

sentences.en: Miles can do carpentry and he's good with his hands.
sentences.cn: 迈尔斯能做木工活他有一双巧手.

sentences.en: Oh wait, that is for carpentry, but nonetheless it works here as well!
sentences.cn: 哦，等等，这是对木工而言的！ 没错，但是它在这里也很适用！

sentences.en: Robin moved to town and turned his hand to carpentry.
sentences.cn: 罗宾到城里干木匠活去了.

sentences.en: Shingling is a craft very different from carpentry.
sentences.cn: 锻造是一种非常不同于木工的技艺.

sentences.en: The carpentry and soldier demand constraints are similar.
sentences.cn: 木工和士兵的需求约束是类似的。

sentences.en: Tom moved to town and turned his hand to carpentry.
sentences.cn: 汤姆到城里去做木工去了.

sentences.en: Typical arrangements with carpentry sub - trades vary in different countries.
sentences.cn: 各国对建筑木工惯常的安排是不同的.

sentences.en: Wear goggles when you're doing carpentry or even yard work.
sentences.cn: 23当你干木活甚至院子活时戴护目镜.

words.tran_cn: 木器；木工手艺；[木]木工业

trans.tran_en: the skill or work of a carpenter
